transcript:
Jya vyakti is aapan call kelela ahe, ti sadhya itar konashi bolat ahe. Aapan pratiksha karu shakta, kinva nantar punha prayatna.
Hello.
Haa.
Hello. Daalgaavkar hai pallavi boluy India Mart se.
Haa boliye madam.
Sir aapka call aaya tha aaj ki mere number pe aapne subah me call kiya tha na to mai thodi busy chal rahi thi. Mai aapko phone bhi nahi utha payi thi to.
Excuse me mai matlab hospital case me hu to phone aaya hoga kisi ka to maine laga diya repeat aisa ho gaya.
Abhi pitaji thode bimar hai.
Haa wo aapne last time bataya tha sir tabhi thoda to serious hai kya vaisa.
Haa haa haa isliye thoda sa mai ek 10-15 din to thoda usi me hu.
Achcha. Fire unka shaid kaatna padega ye ye chal raha hai wo fire ki ungli vagaira.
Wo thoda sa isme to mai karta hu aapko fir hai na.
Sir koi baat nahi hai matlab hum samajhte hai is cheez ko aap aaram se mai 15 din tak kabhi aapko disturb bhi nahi karungi. Sir ek cheez aapka aise wo India Mart se us pe call aaya tha na to ek ticket open ho gaya tha to abhi mai usko close kar du na fir.
Haa haa close kara dijiye close kara dijiye. Sir ek mai aapse request karungi ek na feedback jayega is call ke liye to please usme satisfied me reply kar dijiyega primary pe jayega sir.
Yes yes yes.
Thank you so much sir. Ji ji thank you sir matlab.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is in hospital due to father's illness.

- Executive wants to close an open ticket.

- Executive requests for a positive feedback.



Resolution:

- Executive assured not to disturb for 15 days.

- Customer agreed to close the ticket.

- Customer agreed to provide positive feedback.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, feedback, hospital, illness
